channel.title: Make Headband
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Make Headband" - I had questions. I'm sure others do.

item.title: Make Headband
item.content:encoded:
Headband Creation

*Village Name* Village:
The Village hidden in *Whatever*

To create an awesome headband for your Village, here's what you need to do:

1: Download either the Silver or Bronze swatch below.

100x60 #ACAFB8 100x60 #D9B426

2: Draw your headband design on it. (Alternatively, you can just upload any small picture, but making it look like it is on the metal looks cool)

3: Save your image as an RGB .JPG file.

4: Click 'Browse' and pick the image you saved.

5: Select which color metal you want - Silver or Bronze.

6: Select the background color of your headband. Click the 'Background' box to pop up a picture to help you choose the color.

7: Click 'Upload' at the bottom, and you'll be taken to a confirmation page.

Select Metal Type:

Select File Name:

Select Color:

Then, hit 'Upload' here, to view and confirm your image,
and send it up for quick approval!

Upload Headband - 5000 Village Ryo >
